nl.esciencecenter.esight.models

Class BoundingBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.esight.models.BoundingBox

  • public class BoundingBox
extends java.lang.Object
    Bounding box implementation for use in behind-the-scenes graphics calculations. (for now, mainly used in Text implementation)
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Unsets initialization state.

      • resize

        public void resize(VecF3 newEntry)
        Resize method for this bounding box. Changes the bounds based on the addition of new points. Updates minX, minY and minZ global variables and sets initialized state.
        Parameters:
        newEntry - A new vertex in the model to which this bounding box applies.

             throws UninitializedException

        Throws:
